mapper.select: select waterId, typeName,areaName,waterName,waterUpperLimit,waterLowerLimit,useWaterAmount,waterForm.creatorName,waterForm.createDate from waterForm join energyType on waterForm.typeId=energyType.typeId join area on waterForm.areaId=area.areaId UNION All select electricityId,typeName,areaName, electricityName,elecUpperLimit,elecLowerLimit,useElecAmount,electricityForm.creatorName,electricityForm.createDate from electricityForm join energyType on electricityForm.typeId=energyType.typeId join area on electricityForm.areaId=area.areaId
